feed.title: Taproot Assets on Mainnet: Announcing tapd v0.3.0-alpha

entry.title: Taproot Assets on Mainnet: Announcing tapd v0.3.0-alpha
entry.summary:
In an email received, the sender points out a missing citation to their work on scalable asset transfer from 2017. They provide a link to their website where the work can be found: https://petertodd.org/2017/scalable-single-use-seal-asset-transfer. The sender also mentions that the key concepts in universes are very similar to their work. They provide their contact information as 'peter'[:-1]@petertodd.org.
It appears that the sender is requesting that the recipient include a citation to their work on scalable asset transfer from 2017. They provide a link to their website where the work can be accessed. Additionally, they mention that the key concepts in universes are similar to their work. The sender concludes the email by providing their contact information as 'peter'[:-1]@petertodd.org.
